recipe.title: Apple Rosé Sangria Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ; lemon, sliced, plus more for garnish
1 ½ cups ; apple cider, sparkling ; (360 mL)

steps.step: In a large pitcher, combine the green apple, red apple, lemon, simple syrup, whiskey, apple cider, and rosé. Stir well, then chill until ready to serve, up to 2 days.
Immediately before serving, add the sparkling apple cider and stir to incorporate.
Pour into glasses and garnish with lemon wedges.
